mapper.select: SELECT si.* FROM `storage_input` si WHERE si.statistic_flag = 0;

SELECT si.`customer_product_code`, p.product_code, p.`product_name`, p.`model` AS product_model, CASE p.`type` WHEN 0 THEN '原料' WHEN 1 THEN '半成品' WHEN 2 THEN '成品' ELSE '未定义' END AS product_type, CASE p.`product_unit` WHEN 0 THEN '片' WHEN 1 THEN '个' WHEN 2 THEN 'KG' ELSE '未定义' END AS product_unit, -- si.`order_no`, p.`total_amount`, si.`amount`, CASE si.`type` WHEN 0 THEN '采购入库' WHEN 1 THEN '生产入库' WHEN 2 THEN '退货入库' ELSE '未定义' END AS input_type, si.`create_time`, si.`update_time` FROM `storage_input` si LEFT JOIN `product_info` p ON p.`customer_product_code` = si.`customer_product_code` LEFT JOIN `customer_info` ci ON p.`customer_id` = ci.`id` where 1=1 AND si.`customer_product_code` like CONCAT('%',#{customerProductCode},'%') AND si.`type`=#{type} AND si.`create_time` >= #{startTime} AND si.`create_time` <= #{endTime}
